tweets.text: @iam_James83 @Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE @YISF__INNS @bradfordmdc It is easy to pull up if you have a few minutes this weekend, I'd start on your garden asap to make sure it doesn't seed.  Pull it up and then break the stem if half and leave it in a pile to rot down; a really quick process.

@JuliaBradbury @TeamBen_13 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency And it‚Äôs affecting people - children with health issues already some have respiratory issues already and it‚Äôs not helping this toxic dump is affecting thousands and even people with #autism I‚Äôve had so many messages

@TeamBen_13 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency I would urge you @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency to look at this issue again TODAY & do something about it. Nose bleeds, headaches, longer term serious health implications from H2S inhalation - this is a huge public health problem & the community are suffering

I find it surprising that @RedIndustries2 who says they‚Äôre working tirelessly to reduce the toxic gas emissions has been found in breach of permit for failing to follow their own odour management plan? Can you comment Red @BGFinvestments @HSBC_UK ? #stopthestink @Barclays https://t.co/tUyyor1Yxe

tweets.text: No sleep then work.On top of that worrying about children‚Äôs breathing in gas while sleeping +spouses health all the time struggling 2breathe yourself!! How is this ok?? No real answer no real solution HELP üÜò people are debilitated and depleted. Desperate and down @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/BE9Q3wPT0X

Currently growing barley but it‚Äôs future = concrete. And a massive SuDS area to mitigate against flooding. Because this is a river valley. It handily holds excess water for us for free. Utter madness to build here!! @CPREKent @CommunityPlann1 @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/owzHqgEN8G

tweets.text: Credit to the @EnvAgency for fining Thames Water ¬£4mr for damage to the Hogsmills in Berrylands. Residents need to remain vigilant to protect  @BerrylandsNR &  @CitizenZoo water voles https://t.co/uW06v2Akw8

üì¢ Registration now open for our webinar on #data & the #environment: Weds 16th June, 9:30am - 10:30am BST/(UTC+1). 

Hear @abi_edin from @GeospatialC, Chris Jarvis from @EnvAgency, our CEO @billroberts & Darren Barnes of @ONS 

https://t.co/RCVaTl8Tfm #geospatial #statistics

@Calderdale @YISF__INNS @EnvAgencyYNE @CalderCountry Does that mean I can uproot the Himalayan Balsam growing up on Roils Head?
Also, where can I report new patches of Japanese knotweed in the same area?

@Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE @YISF__INNS @CalderCountry We have Himalayan Balsam growing in empty land next to us. It‚Äôs starting to grow in my garden now üò©. Sadly we‚Äôre not in Calderdale. I hope @bradfordmdc will help us Bash The Balsam here too, especially so as the Balsam growing next to me is on the ‚ÄúMillennium Way‚Äù walk number 4

@EnvAgencyMids it‚Äôs 2.30am and the smell from Walleys landfill is horrendous. I live 1.5 miles away and the smell is inside my house. My eyes are sore. I cannot sleep. It‚Äôs in breach of my human right for private and family life. #StopTheStink

The @EnvAgencyMids have milestones for @RedIndustries2 but @ClareDinnisEA has given no ‚Äòdelivery‚Äô date‚Äô to mitigate the odourü§∑No root cause found plus the unexpected behaviour of the toxic gas, means let try a few things & keep our ü§ûIs this a joke? It‚Äôs not a plan #stopthestink

We‚Äôre holding a #covidsafe #community session on Wed 26 May to answer residents‚Äô questions & give you the latest on regulation of #WalleysQuarry. 

Details on how to join below üëá

We‚Äôll also make the session available afterwards for those who can‚Äôt join on the day. https://t.co/njxpZMmOOL
